name: Berry Biters
description:
Help the long neck collect all the berries while dodging the Meat eating DINO'S!
Use the arrow keys to navigate the long neck to eat all of the berries! Watch out, they regrow fast so eat them fast!

Trex and Spinosaurous are also looking for a yummy snack so keep away from them!

Eat all the berries before you run out of lives and you will win!
